spec_data.Name: groonga-normalizer-mysql
spec_data.Description:
This package provides MySQL compatible normalizer plugin.
You can use NormalizerMySQLGeneralCI and NormalizerMySQLUnicodeCI as normalizer.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 09:06:44 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: MySQL compatible normalizer plugin for Groonga
